= Install all files needed to build a package =
sudo apt-get build-dep xboard

= ATI Driver Config from Command Line =
sudo amdcccle

= Manage startup services in Ubuntu =
sudo sysv-rc-conf

= Completely remove a package =
sudo apt-get --purge remove <name>

= To open a root terminal =
sudo -i

= Virtual Box =
guest property commands for setting environment variables and communicationbetween the guest and host os's: VBoxControl guestproperty
